traits.Mushroom Portal: The chamberlain counts as a mushroom for the Fungus Stride feature of the bridesmaid of Zuggtmoy.
traits.Poison Spores: Whenever the chamberlain takes damage, it releases a cloud of spores. Creatures within 5 feet of the chamberlain when this happens must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
